pages.text: In case your power is allomantic, you will need to recharge your power reserves in order to start burning it.$(br) This is done by placing in a $(l:vials_entry/vials)Vials$() the Nuggets of the metal you wish to charge, or of various metals, if you have more than one power to use

pages.title: How to use?
pages.text: once the vial is loaded, you must ingest it and you will see how your reserves are loaded.$(br) Finally, you must press the "M" key and select your power to activate it
